about_the_game:
A 4D Word Battler in space! Challenge yourself to score big in an unending high score chaser or unlock the story mode and help save humanity from an alien menace.

A challenging variant on everyone's favourite word game. Each grid is randomly generated so each playthrough will be unique. The game is easy to learn, but difficult to master. You'll be given a grid of four interconnecting 5 letter words. The aim is to turn the top grid green.

4ordle is the perfect game for anyone who loves word puzzles, With its simple but engaging gameplay, you'll be able to dive right in and start solving grids from the first moment you play.

4ordle is not only fun, but also educational. It helps you improve your vocabulary and spelling, making it a great way to keep your mind sharp. Looking for a fun and addictive word game that will keep you entertained for hours? Look no further than 4ordle!
